commands.name: /cl:on
commands.title: Start Monitoring
commands.description: Start the ClaudeCodeLooper auto-restart monitor in daemon mode.

commands.name: /cl:off
commands.title: Stop Monitoring
commands.description: Stop all active ClaudeCodeLooper monitoring sessions.

commands.name: /cl:status
commands.title: Show Monitor Status
commands.description: Display current status, waiting periods, and detection counts.

commands.name: /cl:logs
commands.title: Show Monitor Logs
commands.description: Stream recent log output and highlight limit detections.

commands.name: /cl:queue
commands.title: Add Queued Task
commands.description: Queue a follow-up task to run after the next restart.

commands.name: /cl:queue:list
commands.title: List Queued Tasks
commands.description: List queued tasks waiting for the restart cycle.

commands.name: /cl:queue:delete
commands.title: Remove Queued Tasks
commands.description: Remove queued tasks by their list numbers.

commands.name: /cl:queue:templates
commands.title: List Task Templates
commands.description: Display available queue templates and guidance.
